Chemistry
@graph.title: Best practices in chemistry teacher education
abstract: Growing teachers and improving chemistry learning: how best practices in chemistry teacher education can enhance chemistry education -- Strategies for building a community of undergraduate stem pre-service teachers -- Teach (STEM)3: a clinical residency model for preparing effective STEM teachers -- Combining pedagogical methods with hands-on chemistry demonstrations -- Advancing professional knowledge and skills for chemistry teaching through an online master's degree for secondary-level chemistry teachers -- Crosscutting concepts as a framework for professional development in NGSS curriculum for high school chemistry -- Resource bridging between high school and college educators: an interactive approach for a dual credit chemistry course -- Summer workshop for high school teachers to utilize MOOCs in their classroom -- Redesigned pre-service training for teaching assistants in high enrollment, active learning based general chemistry courses -- A collaborative professional development program for science faculty and graduate students in support of education reform at two-year Hispanic-serving institutions -- Supporting faculty in adopting active learning pedagogies.
"This book is about best practices in chemistry teacher education"--
